backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing deposit transactions with multi-currency support and 20% tax calculation, user profiles, winning records, M-PESA payment integration (paybill 400004), and access control with admin/user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting five authentication UX improvements: inline authentication prompts, automatic login persistence, one-click login flow, loading indicators, and prominent LoginButton styling with Betika green colors.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of frontend components including profile management, deposit interface with tax calculation, transaction history, betting history, phone verification for 16 African countries, and Betika green theme integration.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark modes, including custom Betika green theme colors and sidebar styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, 'Betika Casino' title, root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component with TanStack Router setup, Layout component featuring sticky header with Betika green gradient logo, authentication-aware UserMenu/LoginButton toggle, and routes for admin and games pages.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Inline authentication banner using Alert component with prominent 'Sign In Securely' button, loading states, and three feature highlight cards explaining secure authentication, payout management, and transaction tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminFundsReleas: Admin component for managing pending winner payouts with tax calculation (20%), displaying gross/net amounts, and releasing winnings to users via M-PESA with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/DataTable.tsx: Reusable table component that renders data with configurable columns, custom formatters, and handles empty states.
frontend/src/components/DepositSection.t: Multi-currency deposit component supporting 9 currencies with exchange rate conversion to KES, 20% tax calculation, M-PESA payment instructions, and transaction tracking.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component using Internet Identity that handles login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/UserMenu.tsx: Dropdown menu component displaying user profile with avatar, principal ID, and logout functionality with disabled profile/admin links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor with Internet Identity authentication, admin token initialization, and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for deposits, user profiles, and admin fund releases with mock data for pending winners and release history.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including a Betika green color scheme and utility classes for brand colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with access control that displays fund release management, release history with tax calculations (20%), and summary statistics for authenticated admin users.
frontend/src/pages/GamesPage.tsx: Games management page with admin-only access that displays placeholder statistics for total games, active bets, wins, and revenue.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Empty profile page component with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/phoneValidation.ts: Empty phone validation utility file with no implementation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for a BETIKA-like betting and casino app with multi-currency support, M-PESA integration (paybill 400004), 20% tax on stakes/withdrawals, and features including user profiles, phone verification, payment deposits/withdrawals, casino games, live games, and jackpots. Contains architectural notes, known issues (difficult login flow), and a comprehensive list of implemented features with their requirement IDs.
